item.title: Sending an SMTP email in Python 3
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: This took me far longer than it should have, and while I’d like to blame shotty documentation and sparse examples it was probably my own stupidity causing the issue. Whatever the case maybe I wanted to jot down my results as I’m sure I’ll need to do this again.
